saveToInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be saved to the inbox.

silentInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be sent silently to the inbox.

messageContext.silentInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be sent silently to the inbox.

email.description: The email address of the user.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the message expires.

catalogLookupCount.description: The count of catalog lookups associated with the in-app send event.

messageContext.saveToInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be saved to the inbox.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used in the in-app send event.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the in-app send event occurred.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the in-app send event.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

channelId.description: The unique identifier of the channel used.

priorityLevel.description: The priority level of the message.

messageTypeId.description: The type identifier of the message.

transactionalData.description: The transactional data associated with the in-app send event.

productRecommendationCount.description: The count of product recommendations associated with the in-app send event.

contentId.description: The unique identifier of the content associated with the in-app send event.

catalogCollectionCount.description: The count of catalog collections associated with the in-app send event.
